title: 【mek】模组问题
author: wshzs
txt_content: 为什么我的模组里没有风电

replies.author: 是叶子呀
replies.txt_content: 可能没装通用机械发电机

replies.author: EmptyLava
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mcmod.cn/item/39961.html
有的啊，你确定mek加载了吗

replies.author: 枯露君
replies.txt_content:
可能没安装发电机mod？
https://www.mcmod.cn/class/1323.html

replies.author: 逍__遥
replies.txt_content: 你忘记加入MEK发电机扩展MOD了

replies.author: Twilight_Two
replies.txt_content: 哈？就1.7.10的mek来说，好像风力发电机是没有翻译的。你可以试试搜索wind这个单词试试

replies.author: yun5477
replies.txt_content: MEK的发电设备是单独的模组 工具也是
